roleset.name: elevate, lift up
roleset.note: UPRAISE-V NOTES: Added by Julia for EWT.
UPRAISED-J NOTES: Added by Julia for EWT.

example.name: upraise-v
example.text: [The two hands]-1 when-2 upraised *T*-1 *T*-2 and folded together represent : " Now I am trying to establish a link with Parama Purus'a -LRB- Supreme Consciousness -RRB- . "
